description: The ideal all-around hiking boot for kids. A waterproof-breathable membrane lets them skip happily through the rain, and the TechLite midsole keeps feet cushioned and comfy for days when the adventure doesn't end until dinner.Upper is durable waterproof PU-coated suede.Seam-sealed, waterproof-breathable construction keeps feet dry in wet conditions.Lightweight TechLite midsole offers support, cushioning and high energy return.Outsole is Omni-GRIP non-marking traction rubber for added grip.
name: Columbia Newton Ridge Suede Boots - Children to Youths
